TABLE.NAME: exammanagement
TABLE.COMMENT: contains all exam management instances and their general exam information

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of course the exammanagement activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the exammanagement activity

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: General introduction of the exammanagement activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the intro field (MOODLE, HTML, MARKDOWN...)

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: Category id of the course the exammanagement activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: password
FIELD.COMMENT: Hashed user password of the exammanagement activity

FIELD.NAME: rooms
FIELD.COMMENT: Room ids of the rooms choosen for the exam as array in json syntax

FIELD.NAME: examtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of date and time of the exam

FIELD.NAME: importfileheaders
FIELD.COMMENT: Headers of imported participants lists as array in json syntax

FIELD.NAME: tempimportfileheader
FIELD.COMMENT: Temporary saved header of last imported text file as string in json syntax

FIELD.NAME: tasks
FIELD.COMMENT: Exam tasks and related points as object in json syntax

FIELD.NAME: textfield
FIELD.COMMENT: Content and format of textfield as object in json syntax

FIELD.NAME: datetimevisible
FIELD.COMMENT: Information if date and time is set user visible

FIELD.NAME: roomvisible
FIELD.COMMENT: Information if room is set user visible

FIELD.NAME: placevisible
FIELD.COMMENT: Information if place is set user visible

FIELD.NAME: bonusvisible
FIELD.COMMENT: Information if bonus is set user visible

FIELD.NAME: resultvisible
FIELD.COMMENT: Information if result is set user visible

FIELD.NAME: gradingscale
FIELD.COMMENT: Gradingscale for the exam as array in json syntax

FIELD.NAME: datadeletion
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of the date of correction completion

FIELD.NAME: deletionwarningmailids
FIELD.COMMENT: Arrays with the ids of send mails with deletion warnings in json syntax

FIELD.NAME: examreviewtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of the date and time of the exam review

FIELD.NAME: examreviewroom
FIELD.COMMENT: Room for the exam review as text in json syntax

FIELD.NAME: examreviewvisible
FIELD.COMMENT: Information if exam review time is set visible

FIELD.NAME: datadeleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Information if the exam data is deleted

FIELD.NAME: misc
FIELD.COMMENT: Other config values in json syntax (not used at the moment)

TABLE.NAME: exammanagement_participants
TABLE.COMMENT: contains all exam participants from all exam management instances and their respective data

FIELD.NAME: exammanagement
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the exam management activity the participant belongs to

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course of the exam management activity the participant belongs to

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course category id of the exammanagement activity the participant belongs to

FIELD.NAME: moodleuserid
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle intern user id of the participant

FIELD.NAME: login
FIELD.COMMENT: Login of the participant

FIELD.NAME: firstname
FIELD.COMMENT: First name of the participant (in case of nonmoodle)

FIELD.NAME: lastname
FIELD.COMMENT: Last name of the participant (in case of nonmoodle)

FIELD.NAME: email
FIELD.COMMENT: Mail address of the participant (in case of nonmoodle)

FIELD.NAME: headerid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the header of the file the participant is imported from

FIELD.NAME: roomid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the room assigned to the participant

FIELD.NAME: roomname
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the room assigned to the participant

FIELD.NAME: place
FIELD.COMMENT: Place assigned to the participant

FIELD.NAME: exampoints
FIELD.COMMENT: Exam results of the participant as object in json syntax

FIELD.NAME: examstate
FIELD.COMMENT: Exam state of the participant as object in json syntax

FIELD.NAME: timeresultsentered
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of the date when the results where entered

FIELD.NAME: bonus
FIELD.COMMENT: Bonusstep of the participant

TABLE.NAME: exammanagement_temp_part
TABLE.COMMENT: contains all temporary saved potential participants from all exam management instances and their respective data

FIELD.NAME: exammanagement
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the exam management activity the potential participant belongs to

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course of the exam management activity the potential participant belongs to

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course category id of the exammanagement activity the potential participant belongs to

FIELD.NAME: identifier
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifier of the potential participant

FIELD.NAME: line
FIELD.COMMENT: Line number of the potential participant in the imported participants list

TABLE.NAME: exammanagement_rooms
TABLE.COMMENT: contains all default and custom exam rooms available in the exam management instances

FIELD.NAME: roomid
FIELD.COMMENT: Room id (internal)

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the room

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of the room

FIELD.NAME: seatingplan
FIELD.COMMENT: Seating plan as vector graphic (svg)

FIELD.NAME: places
FIELD.COMMENT: Places of the room as array in json syntax

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Room type (default or custom)

FIELD.NAME: moodleuserid
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle intern id of user who created custom room

FIELD.NAME: misc
FIELD.COMMENT: Other config values in json syntax (at the moment only timestamp default room is created)
